page.syntax: Height as N = WRAP_TEXT_HEIGHT(C text,N Width[,N offset])

argument.name: text
argument.description: The text to draw on the bitmap. Character

argument.name: Width
argument.description: The width of the rectangle within the text is wrapped. Numeric

argument.name: offset
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0. The offset from the left edge of the bitmap where the text begins. Numeric

page.description: Return height wrapped text would have to be given a specified width.
page.discussion: WRAP_TEXT_HEIGHT() returns the height in inches of the text. Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
